comments: This contract was competitively sourced.This contract includes one or more amendments.This contract is a multi-year contract.This contract is a call-up against a PWGSC Procurement tool. FIRE SUPPRESSION SYSTEM REHABILITATION. Amendment #1 involves the preparation of Construction Documents with a class 'A' cost estimate for the upgrade of fire suppression systems at two historic sites maintained by Parks Canada, to bring them up to current codes and guidelines - National Fire Code, Parks Canada CRM Policy and NFPA. The design, construction documents, tender and construction administration will be provided for Cannery site and design and construction documents for the Fort Langley site.
